description: Historical images documenting the heritage and development of Farthing Downs and Happy Valley area

images.suggested_alt_text: Redacted historical letter from Angus regarding Farthing Downs
images.suggested_caption: Historical correspondence concerning Farthing Downs (redacted for privacy)
images.review_reason: Verify content is appropriate for public display

images.suggested_alt_text: Farthing Downs car park in spring 2011 showing parked vehicles and wooden bollards
images.suggested_caption: The car park at Farthing Downs, Spring 2011

images.suggested_alt_text: Aerial photograph of Farthing Downs from March 1944 showing the downland, surrounding housing developments, and field patterns
images.suggested_caption: Aerial view of Farthing Downs, March 1944 - showing the wartime landscape with surrounding housing development

images.suggested_alt_text: Historical estate map of Fairdean Heights Ltd showing planned housing development near Farthing Downs with pink-shaded plots
images.suggested_caption: Fairdean Heights Ltd estate map - showing the planned housing development adjacent to Farthing Downs Public Open Space

images.suggested_alt_text: Detailed illustration of a Stone Age flint axe found on Farthing Downs, shown from three angles with scale in inches
images.suggested_caption: Stone Age flint axe found on Farthing Downs by Brian Hope-Taylor, from Surrey Archaeological Collections XLIX (1946)

images.suggested_alt_text: Black and white photograph of swing boats fairground ride with people enjoying the attraction at Farthing Downs
images.suggested_caption: Swing boats at Farthing Downs - a traditional fairground attraction once enjoyed on the Downs

images.suggested_alt_text: Black and white photograph of the historic tea rooms building at Farthing Downs with people and vintage car visible
images.suggested_caption: The historic tea rooms at Farthing Downs - a once popular refreshment stop for visitors

images.suggested_alt_text: Side view of the historic Farthing Downs tea rooms building
images.suggested_caption: Tea rooms at Farthing Downs - side view showing the building's architecture

images.suggested_alt_text: Alternative side view of the historic Farthing Downs tea rooms building
images.suggested_caption: Tea rooms at Farthing Downs - alternative angle showing the building

notes: This collection documents the historical development and heritage of the Farthing Downs area, including wartime aerial photography, archaeological finds, and social history related to recreational use of the site.
